channel.title: Whats-news on MongoDB Node.js Core Driver
channel.description: Recent content in Whats-news on MongoDB Node.js Core Driver

item.title: What's New
item.description:
What’s New in 1.2

Key features of the 1.2 driver include:

  • Implements SDAM specification.
  • Performance improvements.
  • New JS-BSON parser that supplants the C++ extension.
  • Brand new logging library exposed to drivers.

Driver revision history.
